original_text: And when the Philistines heard the noise of the shouting, they said, “What does this great shouting in the camp of the Hebrews mean?” And when they learned that the ark of the Lord had come to the camp,
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 그 외치는 소리를 듣고 이르되 히브리 진영에서 큰 소리로 외침은 어찌 됨이냐 하다가 여호와의 궤가 진영에 들어온 줄을 깨달은지라

sentences.original_text: And when the Philistines heard the noise of the shouting,
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 외치는 소리를 들었을 때에,

sentences.original_text: “What does this great shouting in the camp of the Hebrews mean?”
sentences.korean_translation: ‘히브리 사람들의 진중에서 이 큰 외침은 무엇을 의미하는가?’

sentences.original_text: that the ark of the Lord had come to the camp,
